title: Mets and Edwin Diaz are Finalizing $102 Million Contract
description: Steven A. Cohen and the Mets are on the verge of completing an eye-popping deal with the right-hander Edwin Díaz that will be the largest contract for a reliever in baseball history.
dc:creator: Benjamin Hoffman

media:content.media:credit: Michelle Farsi for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Edwin Díaz and the Mets are finalizing a contract that has an average annual value of $20.4 million.
